import React from 'react' import { Item, Button, Icon, Label, Comment, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { COMMENT_DELETE_MUTATION } from '../api/comment' const DEFAULT_ICON = 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/small/matt.jpg' const CustomComment = ({ id, replys, content, posted, username }) => { const user = localStorage.getItem('user') const [ commentDelete ] = useMutation(COMMENT_DELETE_MUTATION) const handleOnDelete = () => { commentDelete({ variables: { id: id } }) window.location.reload(false); } return (
{username}
{posted}
 {content} Reply {(user === username) ? ( Delete ) : null} Jenny Hess
Just now
 Elliot you are always so right :) Reply
) } export default CustomComment
